fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Fundamental bridge between probability and expectation

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: There is a one-to-one correspondence between events and indicator r.v.s, and the probability of an event A is the expected value of its indicator r.v. I_A
The fundamental bridge connects events to their indicator r.v.s, and allows us to express any probability as an expectation
We can often express a complicated discrete r.v. whose distribution we donâ€™t know as a sum of indicator r.v.s, which are extremely simple.
